original_text: And it came to pass after a while, that the brook dried up, because there had been no rain in the land.
korean_text: 땅에 비가 내리지 아니하므로 얼마 후에 그 시내가 마르니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after a while
because there had been no rain in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅에 비가 내리지 않았기 때문이었다
